testimonials.detail: Frank Michels has produced demos for over 70 of my songs. I appreciate Frank's professional arrangements and the fact that he includes at no extra cost the instrument tracks that I am able to record my own voice to.

testimonials.lead: Frank's demos are nothing short of amazing.
testimonials.detail: His ability to work in a wide range of styles, with varied instrumentation and great vocals at a reasonable price makes him a true Nashville treasure.
testimonials.songwriter: R. Simbeck (writer for Bob Kingsleyâ€™s Country Top 40)

testimonials.detail: I just wanted to let you know that I am extremely impressed with your work. I wish I had found you a year ago-- It would have saved me a lot of time, money and stress.
Thank you Frank, your ability to hear the song the way I do just blows me away! And please tell Debra thanks as well, I am fortunate to have you both on the songs.
Wow Frank, I love the song! I like the ending a lot and especially all of the small accents and embellishments in verse two.
Thanks for the MP3 and for a very good demo. You really worked some magic to take the crude effort I sent you and made it sound professional!!
I absolutely love it! It's exactly the style and attitude I was looking for. Awesome music and vocals! I can't believe how quickly I got my demo. I will definitely be sending more lyrics soon.
